levels.description: Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP; Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to all nearby enemies, and reduces the RES of enemies hit by <@ba.vup>-{-magic_resistance:0%}</> for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds
